nodes.bodyText:
We avoid using wildcard imports to guard against conflicts due to classes being added to a remote package (rare in java.util but still).
Noted this in other places as well.
If you use IntelliJ, you can increase the threshold for wildcard imports:
Could this also be an auto-value class?

+
